title: Chinese Language | Pronunciation and Tones
headline: Master Chinese pronunciation, eliminate your accent, and sound like a native speaker with this free online course.
description: This free online course teaches you how to master the different tones in Mandarin Chinese and helps you communicate like an authentic native speaker. Did you know that the tone you use when pronouncing a word can change its meaning? Learning how to pronounce words correctly is the key component of mastering Mandarin Chinese. You will learn how to master the Chinese pronunciation system known as Pinyin.
courseDescription:
Mandarin Chinese is the most widely spoken native language with over a billion native speakers. With the continuing economic and political rise of China, it is becoming increasingly important to learn the Chinese language. In this free online Chinese language course, you will learn the Chinese pronunciation system known as Pinyin. Chinese is not a phonetic language; the pronunciation is not related to the writing of Chinese words (characters). Pinyin is a special system, created for people to learn Mandarin pronunciation. Pinyin transcribes the Chinese characters so people can pronounce them. Pinyin is the foundation of the Chinese language; it is essential and the most fundamental part for all Chinese learners. You will learn the three parts that make up the Pinyin system. Chinese is a tonal language, which implies that the tone you use when pronouncing a word can actually change the meaning of what is being said. For example, mà means scold, while mā means mother. You will learn the four tones in the Chinese language to enable you to communicate effectively. You will learn how to use the right tone for the right word.

The course will further teach you the Pinyin finals which consists of three parts: initials, finals, and tone. You will also learn the 24 finals in Chinese. You will learn the simple, compound and nasal finals. You will master them through practice and examples both in Mandarin and their English equivalent. Study how to construct compound finals by two or more simple vowels. Proceed to learn about the sixteen Pinyin whole syllables. You will also learn how to read the whole syllables with the four tones in Mandarin Chinese and discover the principles guiding the Pinyin system.

Learning a second language improves the mind and widens your scope of opportunities. This course will be of great interest to anybody wanting to travel to China for tourism or business. Being able to speak Mandarin will make you feel like an authentic native speaker and you will be able to freely converse without hindrance or being misunderstood. By taking this course you will be able to master the Pinyin system, learn a new language, break the language barrier, communicate effectively and have a feel of the Chinese culture. Enrol today and join over one billion people around the globe to speak one of the largest native languages on Earth.
